channel.title: Cutscenes **GIVING ADMIN!**
channel.description:
Hey all Im new to coding Im running a delta And i want to be able 2 make a cutscene,like the wise old man cutscene in r*n*s*a*e Idk what your policy is with words like tht you can guess, like r u n e s c a p e So anyway i want it so like you click on an npc or you click on like a ball in ur invent then u see like an evil guy destroying everything nd loads of noobs goin help us help us Then from the mist,two heroes walk into the bank The first one,a mage,says some magic words to banish the evil guy the second one,the warrior,kills all the evil guys minions wud be amazing if u cud help I will giv admin on my server if u help or i will make an advertisement I will rep you(if i can)
Thanks Pasta186

item.title: Cutscenes **GIVING ADMIN!**
item.dc:creator: @pasta186 pasta186
item.description:
@pasta186 wrote:

Hey all
Im new to coding
Im running a delta
And i want to be able 2 make a cutscene,like the wise old man cutscene in rnsae
Idk what your policy is with words like tht
you can guess, like r u n e s c a p e
So anyway
i want it so like you click on an npc or you click on like a ball in ur invent
then u see like an evil guy destroying everything
nd loads of noobs goin help us help us
Then from the mist,two heroes walk into the bank
The first one,a mage,says some magic words to banish the evil guy
the second one,the warrior,kills all the evil guys minions
wud be amazing if u cud help
I will giv admin on my server if u help
or i will make an advertisement
I will rep you(if i can)

Thanks
Pasta186
